Posts.Content: Feb 26, 2009 01:53PM MamaShift wrote: Hmmm.  I haven't checked for GI issues and should have before leaving the States.  I was just in a major hurry to get home.  I've been taking probiotics to help heal, but maybe there's something.  Thanks, Rose, I'll look up memberoftheclub.
Posts.Title: Morning Nausea & Vomiting 4 Months Post Chemo MamaShift Roya

Posts.Content: MamaShift wrote: I live abroad and can't get in to see an onc yet.  I just wanted to ask if anyone has experienced this AFTER completing treatment for bc?  I did a pregnancy test this morning even though I'm chemo-induced menopausal -- negative.  Thoughts?
